name: Just A Nightmare (Updog97)
description:
You recently moved into your new cabin. Unfortunately, the storm is keeping you awake, and you also feel like you are being watched. Try to find your sleeping medication to get some rest. 

Made For the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

I didn't have much time to work on the game so it's pretty rough. It is also my first attempt at making a horror game.

The only thing I didn't make was the fps controller and the skybox. Both of which were free.

8K Skybox Pack Free by BG Studio

Modular First Person Controller by JeCase
